render.tex: %text If $R_2$ be the relation \[ \quad R_2 = \left\lbrace (x,y)\,\vert\, x,y\in\mathbb{Z}, x^2 + y^2 = 64 \right\rbrace\] then \[ \quad R_2 = \left\lbrace (-8,0),(0,-8),(0,8),(8,0) \right\rbrace\] %

reason.tex: %text We have been given $R_2$ in set builder form and we have to re-write it in roster form Now, $x$ and $y$ are integers $(x,y\in\mathbb{Z})$ that satisfy the condition $x^2 + y^2 = 64$ Note that when $x = 1$, then $y=\sqrt{63}\notin\Z$. Similarly, if $x = 2$ then too $y\notin\Z$ In fact, only when $x = 0$ is $y\in\Z$. And only when $y=0$ is $x\in\Z$ Hence, the \underline\text{only acceptable $(x,y)$} are \[ R_2 = \left\lbrace (-8,0),(0,-8),(0,8),(8,0) \right\rbrace\] %
